description.intro: MIT is a student-run community built to support Muslim students in Hungary, help them connect, grow, and feel at home.
description.activities: We organize events, gatherings, study sessions, charity activities, and spiritual programs ‚Äî all in a positive, respectful, and welcoming environment.

testimonials.title: What Our Community Says
testimonials.subtitle: Hear from members who have experienced the warmth and growth of our community

reviews.quote: MIT has been a second home for me. The events are always meaningful, and I've made lifelong friends here. It's amazing to be part of such a supportive community.
reviews.name: Ahmad Hassan
reviews.title: University Student

reviews.quote: The programs organized by MIT helped me connect with my faith while pursuing my studies. The environment is welcoming and the people are genuine.
reviews.name: Fatima Rahman
reviews.title: Medical Student

reviews.quote: I was new to Hungary and felt lost until I found MIT. The community embraced me with open arms and helped me adjust to life here. Forever grateful!
reviews.name: Omar Abdullah
reviews.title: Engineering Student

reviews.quote: The charity drives and community service events taught me the true meaning of giving back. MIT is doing incredible work in bringing people together.
reviews.name: Aisha Khan
reviews.title: Graduate Student

reviews.quote: From football tournaments to study circles, MIT offers something for everyone. It's not just an organization, it's a family that supports your growth.
reviews.name: Yusuf Ahmed
reviews.title: Business Student

volunteer.title: Become a Volunteer
volunteer.description: Join our team of passionate volunteers and help us organize meaningful events, build community connections, and make a lasting impact on Muslim students in Hungary.

hero.title: Who We Are
hero.description: The Youth Muslims of Hungary (MIT) is a volunteer-driven organization dedicated to uniting and empowering Muslim youth across Hungary. We provide a space for learning, collaboration, and personal growth, where young Muslims can strengthen their faith and leadership skills. Rooted in the Islamic principles of sincerity, community, and excellence (ihsan), MIT strives to build a generation that serves both the Ummah and wider society with integrity and purpose.

vision.title: MIT Vision
vision.description: To empower Muslim youth in Hungary to become active, confident, and united leaders in faith and society.

mission.title: MIT Mission
mission.description: Our mission is to serve Allah through teamwork, growth, and service to our community. Through education, events, and community service, MIT nurtures the next generation of Muslim leaders.

communityRole.title: OUR ROLE IN THE COMMUNITY
roles: Acts as a bridge between youth and community institutions.
Supports mosque initiatives while filling youth engagement gaps.
Builds unity between Hungarian reverts and international Muslims.
Expands volunteerism culture among young Muslims.

achievements.title: KEY ACHIEVEMENTS
list: Organized Ramadan Sadaqa Programs supporting families in need.
Launched a Youth Internship Project to empower young Muslims.
Initiated the Gaza Student Support Campaign.
First to start Marriage Education & Matching Programs in Hungary.
Introduced the first Du'aa Training Program.
Hosted successful events in multiple mosques.
Operated fully through volunteer work without financial support.
First Muslim youth group to collaborate with Hungarian universities.
Helped build a successful, empowered Muslim generation.

shortTerm.title: Short-Term (Next 3-6 Months)
goals: Get Use to the new system and new Leadership style.

longTerm.title: Long-Term (Next 1-2 Years)
goals: Build strong partnerships with Hungarian institutions.
Establish MIT as a recognized youth platform in HU.
Begin community activism and representation projects.

callToAction.title: Call to Action:
callToAction.subtitle: Together for Allah's Cause
points: Each team member has a vital role (Amanah).
Strive for excellence in all actions.
